goals__remit:
The main aim of EUROCAM is to achieve a significant political presence within the EU so as to influence the decision making of the European Commission, European Parliament and the Member States to support and provide the means for the integration of CAM into European healthcare systems as well as to fund research into its benefits and cost effectiveness. This collaboration recognises the stated wish of the EU institutions to deal with the CAM sector as a whole. 
 
Objectives 
• promoting and facilitating CAM’s role in maintaining citizens' health 
• highlighting the health promotion and illness prevention aspects of CAM for EU public health policy and programmes 
• advancing the accessibility, affordability and availability of CAM
